participant_1.background:
I'm looking for a home with a big yard for my pets to play in and a kitchen where I can cook my favorite Mexican food.
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
i really enjoy making friends.
i take care of my mother and father.
I enjoy spending time outdoors, especially on my property.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy a variety of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
I've never been in a relationship, but I'm open to it if I find someone who shares my passion for dancing.
i can speak three languages.
I was disappointed when my blueberry pie didn't win first place at the county fair.
I love gummy bears and never had kids.

content.text: I had a great birthday yesterday! I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.  How was your day?
Oh my, happy birthday! Mine was quite boring. I just hung out at the house all day. I am disappointed that I didn't win first place at the county fair with my blueberry pie.
Oh, that is so unfortunate! I would have loved to try some blueberry pie. At least you still have more time to perfect your recipe!
Yes, that is true! Maybe next year. I do speak three languages, so that's fun!
Oh really? That's really impressive! I only speak one. What languages do you know?
I know Spanish, English, and French. I'm planning on learning more in the future.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn another language, but I just can't seem to get the hang of it.
It takes time and practice, but it's so worth it!
I'm sure it is. Maybe I'll look into taking some classes or something.
That would be a great idea! I'm sure you'd pick it up quickly.
